page.title: 03Ayrshire Agricultural Show.
page.content: Ayrshire{Agricultural}Association's 143rd Annual Show held at Ayr Race course 1st and 2nd May attracted over 19000 visitors from all over U.K. and abroad. A major attraction for the farming community the show covers all aspects of agriculture including livestock, implements, trade exhibits and{show jumping. }The show is heavily sponsored by banks and is seen by farmers as their main chance to view machinery, discuss finance,evaluate latest developments. It is an opportunity to demonstrate{farming skills,display livestock and compete. The importance of competition is emphasised by the judging of the'Champion of Champions' being the main event. Attempts to attract local people outwith the farming community have had little success but efforts continue.
